table.caption: Description of nova.conf file configuration options for live migration

tr.td: (IntOpt) Maximum bandwidth to be used during migration transfer, in Mbps.
(StrOpt) Migration flags to be set for live migration, defines parameters for use during the migration.
(IntOpt) Number of one-second retries needed in live_migration.
(StrOpt) Define Host URI used by live_migration feature. Any included "%s" is replaced with the migration target host name.
